title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-1.17 - Cleanliness
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 45-1.17 - Cleanliness

State Regulations
A suitable number of containers for refuse shall be
provided in and around amusement devices, temporary structures, viewing stands
and tents. Excessive accumulations of trash or refuse shall be promptly
removed. All parts of amusement devices, temporary structures, viewing stands
and tents used by passengers or customers shall be maintained in a clean
condition. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
45-1.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
